title: Looking for players (Ranked - Gold) - People with commitments; this is the team for you
body:
Hello, 

I am looking for a team to take things to the next level. I am a serious player when it comes to rank and until now i have yet been able to find myself a team that would take things seriously.
Not after the constant LoL player as i know people have commitments, but we can set up days/times that the team is comfortable with to play our team games.

I look forward to meeting new people. 

Current rank - Gold 5, Was Gold 3 season 4 however due to inactivity as unable to find ranked team ended up back in Silver for Season 5. However i pushed myself back into Gold.

Any questions comment below or simply add me in game.

replies.body: hey mate gold 4 here and climbing looking for a team willing to play any role except for jungle
Hey dude :) Add me in game BurstFire301 (i dont have access to my client atm and might forget)
I will add you once i get online later today
